pickler module¶

class pickler.Pickler(source_instance, numtimesteps)¶
add_frequent_variables(variable_names)¶

This function adds a variable which will be saved at every timestep.

add_once_variables(variable_names)¶

This function adds a variable which will be saved once, it should not change.

save_frequent_variables_to_buffer(i)¶

This method saves all frequent variables to the buffer at the given timestep.

save_pickle(pickle_file_name)¶

This function collects the data from the instance and from the buffer and saves them to a pickle file. The saved variable is a dictionary.
